data.title: Philip Wylie, Edwin Balmer
data.meta_description: New York: J.B. Lippincott Company, 1933. Book Club Edition. Hardcover. 344 pp. Duodecimo. 20 cm . Brown cloth over boards with yellow stamped title on spine. Deckled edges. Dust jacket is in very good + condition, sunned, particularly at spine, with some losses to head of spine. Fine. Item #64216 A Great Imaginative Novel of the Atomic Age --from the front panel of dust jacket.
data.text:
Wylie, Philip and Edwin Balmer

When Worlds Collide

New York: J.B. Lippincott Company, 1933. Book Club Edition. Hardcover. 344 pp. Duodecimo. [20 cm]. Brown cloth over boards with yellow stamped title on spine. Deckled edges. Dust jacket is in very good + condition, sunned, particularly at spine, with some losses to head of spine. Fine. Item #64216

"A Great Imaginative Novel of the Atomic Age" --from the front panel of dust jacket.
